title: [Sound] DJ Sona Kinetic Voice Lines
body: Anything I attempt to do to make the VO lines for Kinetic work, it'll start to play and abruptly stop just after starting.  Concussive and Ethereal seem to work just fine, although I usually only hear the same line repeated over and over, rarely any of the others.  The video is specifically showing the Kinetic lines not working.{{sticker:sona-playing}}

replies.body: Thanks for the report! We have a fix ready for 8.7, so you'll have this back to normal next patch! <3
